article_text: A Rock Hill firm hopes to take the confusion out of the Affordable Care Act with a program that helps businesses meet the act’s rules. Stephen Schram, the company’s chief technical officer, said their Trax software is the best product on the market.

article_metadata.title: Rock Hill firm focused on Affordable Care Act compliance | The Herald
